definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: When I looked down the hall I saw what looked like a transparent hunchback limping toward us.
sentences.chinese: 我向下看，看到一個駝背的跛子向我們走來。

sentences.english: She became a cripple, and I don't know what became of her.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道她身上發生了什麼事，讓她成了一個跛子。

sentences.english: As a lame man hath fair legs in vain: so a parable is unseemly in the mouth of fools.
sentences.chinese: 猶如跛子的腳虛懸無力，箴言在愚人口中也是如此。

sentences.english: They say he was tortured; that's why he limps.
sentences.chinese: 他們說他曾被虐待，這就是他成爲跛子的原因。

sentences.english: He became a cripple as a result of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲意外事故而成了跛子。

sentences.english: He was crippled in the war.
The second time when I saw her 10) limping before the 11) crippled.
sentences.chinese: 第二次是看見她在跛子前瘸着腿走。

sentences.english: The cripple dipped the whip tip into the chip solution nearby his hip.
sentences.chinese: 跛子將鞭子末端浸入他臀部旁邊之芯片溶液中。

definition: see 老頭子|老头子[lao3 tou2 zi5]
variant of 叫花子[jiao4 hua1 zi5]
